<<<<<<< HEAD
Divine love spreading forth over all nations, or, The glorious day of unity, peace, and concord tendered unto all the meek of the earth given forth from a tender compassion to the captivated seed of the noble plant of renown ... / by Humphrey Smith. Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.
8 p.
Printed for Thomas Simmons, London : [1658]
"This to go among them called heathens, gentiles, Jews, Turks, infidels, and all sorts of nations upon the earth." Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

8 p.
Printed for Thomas Simmons, London : [1658]
"This to go among them called heathens, gentiles, Jews, Turks, infidels, and all sorts of nations upon the earth." Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
Thomas Simmons
